thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: UBS Suspended From Sponsoring Hong Kong IPOs

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: UBS Suspended From Sponsoring Hong Kong IPOs
text:
Hong Kong’s securities regulator is suspending UBS Group AG from serving as a sponsor on initial public offerings in the city for 18 months, the bank said Friday.
UBS disclosed the regulatory action in its annual report, saying it will appeal the decision.
Hong Kong’s Securities and Futures Commission has been examining UBS’s role as a sponsor...
